entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
